The heretics store much of their power in the consecrated teraliths. They're powerful guardians and reservoirs of magical might at the same time!

If you can kill a few, the heretics would be much weaker. Can you manage such a feat?

I sense a change in the air. Great power is released to the winds, not stored for dark purposes.

You did well. Such power could never bring about something good.

Perhaps Sikander can yet be saved!
